moreDetail.title: beautiful monitor
moreDetail.body: In general, the monitor is good, the only problem is that the monitor is made of poor quality plastic.
strengths: No need for a mouse pad

moreDetail.title: Samsung Monitor
moreDetail.body: Whether this monitor is of good quality or not depends on what your previous monitor was, if like me your previous monitor was a high quality monitor, this monitor will never satisfy you! My previous monitor was Samsung s24d390 and I can't stand this monitor at all, but in any case the quality is not too bad, there were no burnt pixels at all. The problem with this monitor is that it is not suitable for design at all, it does not show the colors accurately, it shows the color of the image as greenish, which you can reduce this greenness with Windows display calibration and have a more normal color. Another problem is that if you make a 50% gray image and move this image on the screen, you will notice a series of spots and lines on the screen, which are more visible in games, and for this reason, I do not recommend this monitor for gaming because it is possible. May it be annoying for you. I wish someone else had mentioned these things, in that case I would have definitely chosen another monitor. Good luck! The problem with this monitor is that it is not suitable for design at all, it does not show the colors accurately, it shows the color of the image as greenish, which you can reduce this greenness with Windows display calibration and have a more normal color. Another problem is that if you make a 50% gray image and move this image on the screen, you will notice a series of spots and lines on the screen, which are more visible in games, and for this reason, I do not recommend this monitor for gaming because it is possible. May it be annoying for you. I wish someone else had mentioned these things, in that case I would have definitely chosen another monitor. Good luck!
weaknesses: روی بعضی سطوح خوب کار نمیکنه

moreDetail.title: This Monitor
moreDetail.body: Whether this monitor is of good quality or not depends on what your previous monitor was, if like me your previous monitor was a high quality monitor, this monitor will never satisfy you! My previous monitor was Samsung s24d390 and I can't stand this monitor at all, but in any case the quality is not too bad, there were no burnt pixels at all. The problem with this monitor is that it is not suitable for design at all, it does not show the colors accurately, it shows the color of the image as greenish, which you can reduce this greenness with Windows display calibration and have a more normal color. May it be annoying for you. I wish someone else had mentioned these things, in that case I would have definitely chosen another monitor. Good luck!
